NOT SURE ABOUT YOUR PERFECT BRACELET SIZE?Follow these steps to find your perfect bracelet size!
Step 1 - Measure your wrist with a flexible tape measurement or a strip of paper just below the wrist bone, where you would wear the bracelet.
Step 2 - Mark your size with and use a ruler to measure the length.
Step 3 - To find your bracelet size, add your wrist size with the appropriate measurements below.
Do you want a snug or loose fit?Most bracelets should have a comfort fit It's best to buy large bracelets with a loose fit, so you donâ€™t feel like you are suffocating your wrist.
Snug Fit - Add 1/4 to 1/2 inchesComfort Fit - Add 3/4 to 1 inchesLoose Fit - Add 1 to 1/4 inches
*** Bracelet length is measured from end to end, not include the length of the tab inside the lock.
